message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a one-time offer, so don't miss out on this amazing deal!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $90 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you won't find a better price anywhere else!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Can you consider $100? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $105. It's the best I can do, but I think you'll find it's still a great deal!
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short of my budget. Can you consider $95? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm trying to stay within my means.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer it to you for $100.50. It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's worth it!
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short of my budget. Can you consider $98? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm trying to stay within my means.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'll make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'll offer it to you for $99.50. This is as low as I'm willing to go, so I hope you'll consider it!
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short of my budget. Can you consider $97? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm trying to stay within my means.
